actions.committee: Senate Committee on Labor and Public Welfare
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Labor and Public Welfare.

official_title: A bill to extend the authorization of appropriations for the Bilingual Education Act, for the Dropout Prevention program, and for section 309 of the Adult Education Act.

summary.text: Extends the authorization of appropriations for the Bilingual Education Act, for the dropout prevention program, under the Elementary and Secondary Education Act of 1965, and for the teacher training program under the Adult Education Act through fiscal year 1974.

titles.title: A bill to extend the authorization of appropriations for the Bilingual Education Act, for the Dropout Prevention program, and for section 309 of the Adult Education Act.
